channel.title: Need some help - most helpful gets mod on server
channel.description:
The person who helps me most gets mod on my server!
Ok I followed the tut on Moparisthebest where you use the "No-IP DUC", I load it up and see this: [img]http://i6.tinypic.com/1z6z8n8.png[/img] (My IP and email blocked out)
That means my server is connected right?
So I turn on my TestScape source and I load the latest Moparscape, I can connect to my server by entering "localhost", "127.0.0.1" and nothing at all.
Do I need to fordward ports? Or am I doing something else wrong? I am using the NETGEAR DG834GT ROUTER
I have tried forwarding ports (I think) by using PortForward, but it doesn't work, can you guys tell me if I'm doing it right(read down)
1.) I pick any random game and it tells me to add a service: (Renamed RS_Server) [img]http://i6.tinypic.com/1z6za5w.png[/img] Do I keep it like this? What do I change the port start/end to? And is it TCP or UCP?
2.) It tells me to add "Firewall Rules" for "Outbound Services" [img]http://i6.tinypic.com/1z6zaq1.png[/img] ^Is that correct?
And thats all I need to do right? Thats the port forwarded? Well, still cannot connect
Remember, the person who most helps me gets my server online will become a mod on it, it'll be up around 8 hours on week days and around 15 hours on weekend, (I'm allowed to leave my pc on when I'm not on it)
Thanks for any help you give me!
-Yogi/Nicer

item.title: Need some help - most helpful gets mod on server
item.dc:creator: @boarding_on_java boarding on java
item.description:
@boarding_on_java wrote:

you need to add to your port to your firewall

(btw i dont want mod on ur server if this helps)

Read full topic

wcmasterjaap:

you did it good but that last picture i dont get. just when u have the no-ip duc installed and open it you should see that thats right. then click on it and i should update then click agian and you should see a emoticon like this one . then close that no-ip programme and open your compile.bat and open runmoparscape.bat and connect

Still doesn’t work

item.title: Need some help - most helpful gets mod on server
item.dc:creator: @Yogibear_Pk Yogibear Pk
item.description:
@Yogibear_Pk wrote:

The person who helps me most gets mod on my server!

Ok I followed the tut on Moparisthebest where you use the “No-IP DUC”, I load it up and see this:

(My IP and email blocked out)

That means my server is connected right?

So I turn on my TestScape source and I load the latest Moparscape, I can connect to my server by entering “localhost”, “127.0.0.1” and nothing at all.

Do I need to fordward ports? Or am I doing something else wrong? I am using the NETGEAR DG834GT ROUTER

I have tried forwarding ports (I think) by using PortForward, but it doesn’t work, can you guys tell me if I’m doing it right(read down)

1.) I pick any random game and it tells me to add a service: (Renamed RS_Server)

Do I keep it like this? What do I change the port start/end to? And is it TCP or UCP?

2.) It tells me to add “Firewall Rules” for “Outbound Services”

^Is that correct?

And thats all I need to do right? Thats the port forwarded? Well, still cannot connect

Remember, the person who most helps me gets my server online will become a mod on it, it’ll be up around 8 hours on week days and around 15 hours on weekend, (I’m allowed to leave my pc on when I’m not on it)

Thanks for any help you give me!

-Yogi/Nicer
